name: Khajiit
startIntroPart1: This one is the First one of Elswyer, The First Mane
startIntroPart2: This one Seeks prosperity for the Khajiiti and commerce. Now, let's talk, yes?
declaringWar: Commerce between us has failed, now this one will secure Khajiit's pace.
attacked: So be it. This one will teach you why this one is the first mane.
defeated: Masser and Secunda have abandoned this one. The next mane will be worthy, I hope.
neutralLetsHearIt: Khajiit has wares if you have coins.
neutralNo: This deal don't help this one
Surely this one has better deals, yes?
neutralYes: It was good doing bussiness with you
May your feet leads you to better sands.
hateLetsHearIt: This one will not be impressed by this deal, yes?
hateYes: Khajiits barely will benefit from this. You may go.
afterPeace: Commerce will heal our bonds, yes?
